ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/AlDanial/cloc
ns0:entry.ns0:content: cloc counts blank lines, comment lines, and physical lines of source code in many programming languages.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/FelixKrueger/TrimGalore
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A wrapper around Cutadapt and FastQC to consistently apply adapter and quality trimming to FastQ files, with extra functionality for RRBS data

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Gaius-Augustus/BRAKER
ns0:entry.ns0:content: BRAKER is a pipeline for fully automated prediction of protein coding gene structures with GeneMark-ES/ET/EP/ETP and AUGUSTUS in novel eukaryotic genomes

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/SpiderLabs/owasp-modsecurity-crs
ns0:entry.ns0:content: OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) Project (Official Repository)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/awsdocs/aws-cdk-guide
ns0:entry.ns0:content: User guide for the AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK).

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/centreon/centreon-plugins
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Collection of standard plugins to discover and gather cloud-to-edge metrics and status across your whole IT infrastructure.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/darold/ora2pg
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Ora2Pg is a free tool used to migrate an Oracle database to a PostgreSQL compatible schema. It connects your Oracle database, scan it automatically and extracts its structure or data, it then generates SQL scripts that you can load into PostgreSQL.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/ddclient/ddclient
ns0:entry.ns0:content: ddclient updates dynamic DNS entries for accounts on a wide range of dynamic DNS services.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/inverse-inc/packetfence
ns0:entry.ns0:content: PacketFence is a fully supported, trusted, Free and Open Source network access control (NAC) solution. Boasting an impressive feature set including a captive-portal for registration and remediation, centralized wired and wireless management, powerful BYOD management options, 802.1X support, layer-2 isolation of problematic devices; PacketFence c…

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/ocpi/ocpi
ns0:entry.ns0:content: The Open Charge Point Interface (OCPI) allows for a scalable, automated roaming setup between Charge Point Operators and e-Mobility Service Providers. It supports authorisation, charge point information exchange (incl transaction events), charge detail record exchange and finally, the exchange of smart-charging commands between parties.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/tseemann/snippy
ns0:entry.ns0:content: ✂️ ⚡ Rapid haploid variant calling and core genome alignment
